HTMLMediaElementDefaultPlaybackRate.summary: The HTMLMediaElement.defaultPlaybackRate property indicates the default playback rate for the media.

remarks.para: -: Interface used to define the HTMLMediaElement.defaultPlaybackRate property

HTMLMediaElementDefaultPlaybackRate.value: A double. 1.0 is "normal speed," values lower than 1.0 make the media play slower than normal, higher values make it play faster.
